allow: Bash(cmd /c "taskkill /F /IM node.exe 2>nul & cd /d C:\Applikasjoner\SysFlyt & npx prisma generate 2>&1")
Bash(powershell -Command "Get-Process node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force; Start-Sleep -Seconds 2; cd ''C:\Applikasjoner\SysFlyt''; npx prisma generate")
Bash(powershell -Command "Get-Process node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force; Start-Sleep -Seconds 2; cd ''C:\Applikasjoner\SysFlyt''; npm run dev -- -p 5000 2>&1")
